Comparing Two Folders

From the Visual Diff window, you can compare the contents of any two folders. The contents are listed as text, allowing you to identify the items that are the same or changed.

To compare two folders from the Visual Diff window:

  1. With the Visual Diff window open, select File > Open Folders from the menu bar or click the Open button on the toolbar. The Open dialog opens.

  2. Select the first folder to be compared. The Open dialog displays again.

  3. Select the second folder to be compared. Visual Diff then compares the folder contents so that you can see the differences between them.
